reasoning: The selection prioritized articles offering actionable insights, significant market developments, regulatory changes, technological advancements, and mainstream adoption.  Clickbait, repetitive content, or articles focused solely on price predictions without substantial backing were excluded.  Preference was given to news about established cryptocurrencies and impactful events.
